name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
title: Medical Practice: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
desc: "Come sun or rain, nothing could stay the traveling doctor's steps."
in_play_description: After the character uses an Elemental Burst: Heal all of your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
